name: reldmmpl

stmt.origin: reldmmpt2(hs0, hs1, cmpl, universe, universe, csb(hs2, co(cv(hs0), cmps, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs2), cress, crab(hs3, cfv(cbs, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs3), cfsupp, cfv(c0g, cv(hs1)))))))
stmt.pretty: reldmmpt2(hs0, hs1, cmpl, universe, universe, [(hs0[mPwSer]hs1)/ hs2](hs2[|`s]{ hs3 ∈(Base ` hs2)| hs3[finSupp](0 ` hs1)}))

body.origin:
|- wrel(cdm(cmpl))
-| wceq(cmpl, cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, csb(hs2, co(cv(hs0), cmps, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs2), cress, crab(hs3, cfv(cbs, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs3), cfsupp, cfv(c0g, cv(hs1))))))))
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffsc(hs1, universe)
body.pretty:
⊢ Rel(dom(mPoly))
⊣ mPoly =(hs0 ∈ 𝕌, hs1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦[(hs0[mPwSer]hs1)/ hs2](hs2[|`s]{ hs3 ∈(Base ` hs2)| hs3[finSupp](0 ` hs1)}))
⊣ d(hs0, hs1)
⊣ d(hs1, 𝕌)
